name: The Labours of Hercules
overview: You are Hercules and have murdered your own family in a moment of weakness. To get your freedom after your crime you must complete twelve near impossible tasks so you can walk abroad again. The twelve tasks will allow you to meet terrible creatures like Cerberus and Hydra, cross different lands and oceans to complete your tasks. The Labours of Hercules is a text only adventure where you read on screen a description of your surroundings as you type commands in to help you complete your tasks.
